title: The Adventures of Ivan Yang: Master of Time

story.text: Ivan Yang begins his week at the local community center, coaching youth basketball. Unbeknownst to the kids, Ivan draws strength from their laughter and growth—energies that fuel his hidden powers.
While drawing a cityscape in his sketchbook in the park, Ivan spots a strange glimmer on the horizon. A temporal rift is forming, threatening to distort time around the city.

Using his powers, derived from his ability to harness emotional energy and convert it through artistic expression, Ivan confronts the rift. With commanding strokes of his pencil, he begins to seal it.
The rift fights back, distorting everyday scenes into surreal images right out of his drawings. Ivan captures these anomalies on paper, controlling their chaotic influence over reality.
The battle turns tiring as Ivan's own energy depletes. During a coaching session, the children's cheers of determination bolster Ivan's resolve and he sketches a massive time seal over the city.
The rift yields to Ivan’s artistry and control, finally closing. The city breathes a sigh of relief, unknowingly saved by an unsung hero who merges coaching skills with his power over time.

Ivan spends his day reflecting on the week’s tumult, drawing scenes of peace and rejuvenation. Invigorated, he prepares a new series of lessons and sketches, ready for whatever challenges may come next.

ending: As Ivan Yang stashes away his mystical sketchbook, the city sleeps peacefully under the cloak of his vigilant gaze.
moral: The true essence of power lies in how you harness and utilize your gifts to protect and inspire those around you.
